amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. The amounts otherwise made available by this Act for "Appalachian Regional Commission", "Delta Regional Authority", "Denali Commission", "Northern Border Regional Commission", and "Southeast Crescent Regional Commission" are hereby reduced to $0.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding levels for "Appalachian Regional Commi ssion", "Delta Regional Authority", "Denali Commission", "Northern Border Regional Commission", and "Southeast Crescent Regional Commission" to $0.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 273 (Roll no. 343).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 273 (Roll no. 343).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Chabot.
